Bug_title: Application crash on clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user
Status: New/Open/Active (Depends on the Tool you're using)
Description: Application crash on clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user, hence unable to create a new user in the app
Steps_to_reproduce: 1) Logon into the application 2) Navigate to the Users Menu > New User 3) Filled all the user informations fields 4) Clicked on the SAVE button 5) Seen an error page 'ORA1090 Exception:Insert values Error..' 6) See the attached logs for more information (Attach more logs telated to bug..IF any) 7) And also see the attached screenshot of the error page.
Expected_result: On clicking SAVE button, should be prompted to a success message 'New User has been successfully'
Actual_result: Application crashes after clicking the SAVE button while creating new user
